trans-unit.source: Contains text and speech attribute information for consumption by a speech synthsizer engine.
trans-unit.target: Contiene informazioni sugli attributi di testo e vocali da utilizzare nel motore di sintesi vocale.

trans-unit.source: The Speech platform infrastructure unpacks the XML based structure of the SSML input and constructs <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objects.
trans-unit.target: L'infrastruttura della piattaforma vocale decomprime la struttura basati su XML di input SSML e costrutti <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Speech content is available through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance.
trans-unit.target: Contenuto vocale è disponibile tramite il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> le proprietà di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Speech attribute information, such as emphasis, pitch, and rate, are obtained from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Riconoscimento vocale attributo informazioni, ad esempio enfasi, tono e velocità, sono ottenuti dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Particular care is used to respect the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A> on the original <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> when creating the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> on the new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Particolare attenzione viene utilizzato per rispettare la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A> sull'originale <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> durante la creazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> sul nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Costruisce una nuova istanza di <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Default constructor for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Costruttore predefinito per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets speech attribute information for a <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le informazioni sugli attributi vocali per <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> instance is returned, or used to set speech attribute information for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> viene restituita o utilizzata per impostare le informazioni sugli attributi vocali per <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di questa proprietà è `null`.

trans-unit.source: Prosody information can be obtained from the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A> property on the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Prosody informazioni possono essere ottenute dall'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A> proprietà nell'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of the speech text in the fragment.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la lunghezza del testo pronunciato nel frammento.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="int" /> is returned or can be used to set the length, in character, of the text string associated with this fragment to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Un <see langword="int" /> viene restituito o può essere utilizzato per impostare la lunghezza, in caratteri, della stringa di testo associata al frammento da risolvere.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di questa proprietà è 0.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Particular care is used to respect the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A> on the original <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> when creating the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> on the new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Particolare attenzione viene utilizzato per rispettare la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A> sull'originale <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> durante la creazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> sul nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting location of the text in the fragment.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione iniziale del testo nel frammento.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="int" /> is returned or can be used to set the start location, in character, of the part of text string associated with this fragment to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Un <see langword="int" /> viene restituito o può essere utilizzato per impostare la posizione iniziale, in caratteri, della parte della stringa di testo associata a questo frammento da risolvere.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di questa proprietà è 0.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Particular care is used to respect the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A> on the original <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> when creating the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> on the new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Particolare attenzione viene utilizzato per rispettare la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A> sull'originale <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> durante la creazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> sul nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the speech text of the fragment.
trans-unit.target: Imposta o ottiene il testo pronunciato del frammento.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="System.String" /> is returned or can be used to set the speech text to be used by a speech synthesis engine to generate audio output.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="System.String" /> viene restituito o può essere utilizzato per impostare il testo pronunciato da utilizzare nel motore di sintesi vocale per generare l'output audio.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `System.String.Empty`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di questa proprietà è `System.String.Empty`.

trans-unit.source: Applications are free to completely change the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le applicazioni possono modificare completamente il valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Resetting the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> will not change the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Reimpostazione del valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> non modificherà il valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.target: Particolare attenzione viene utilizzato per rispettare la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A> sull'originale <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> durante la creazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> sul nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze.

trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.
